summary: Animations replacer for hand to hand and jump.
descriptionHtml:
Author: evanoblivion
date: 2-13-2012

Description:
Animations replacer for hand to hand and jump.

23-2-2012: Updated Optional Files!
-Frontflip: A front flip Jump, replace normal jump. Superjumpx2.esp not neccessary.
-Backtwistflip: A Backtwist flip jump. Superjumpx2.esp not neccessary.
Select the animation which you like more.

2-15-2012: Updated Optional File!
-Included two files:
1.- deathanimationa.hkx= Death animation replacer, it is a backflip with fall, see the video.
2.- h2h_attackpowerforwardrighthand.hkx= It is a fly kick, rename the file with h2h_attackpowerforwardlefthand.hkx if you want to do this attack with left hand

Recomended Mod in order to do the animations faster:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6701


Included:
-Combo hand to hand (Left Mouse Button + Right Mouse Button)= Combo Kick
-Hand to hand power right hand= Round kick
-Hand to hand power left hand= Backflip twist
-Jump= Backflip. Superjumpx2.esp is neccessary. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/660

Installation: copy data folder in to your game directory.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3-9-2012 Updated Optional Files! Pack Evanoblivion Animations:
Note: Before install it, make a copy from your animation directory, if you have installed another animation mod. This is the directoy C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\animations

Requirements:
-Dual Flurry for all Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6701

Description:
-All weapon Idles have the same animation in order to do the turning animations better.
-Martial Arts:
          Left Power Attack: Backtwist
          Right Power Attack: Flykick
          Combo hand to hand: Combo kick.
          Jump forward or backward: Front flip
          Normal Jump: Backtwist
          One hand Power Attack: Backflip
-Proyectil launch modified, left and right hand
-Alternative Block weapon based on Hand to hand idle.
-Alternative Block bash: fast kick.

Installation: copy data folder in to your game directory.

Known issue:
-While you are blocking your character maybe still blocking eventhough you arenÂ´t hold block button, if it happen then use your shout power, you will leave block.

Infinite shout:
-Open the console and type:
player.forceav shoutrecoverymult 0

Shout fast recovery:
player.forceav shoutrecoverymult 0.2

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Thanks to Umpa for all his help.
author: evanoblivion
